ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois sat in his quarters. He had been given luxiourious space, and some great technoloy to work with. Soon he can start working on an idea to get the three

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
Message-ID: <8j0ikf+2qip@...>

Vulois sat in his quarters. He had been given luxiourious space, and 
some great technoloy to work with. Soon he can start working on an 
idea to get the three of them home. He had returned the Scorponok's 
box to Hell Beast. He was glad too, cause that thing was starting to 
hum, like it was gonna explode or something. Just than his vent shaft 
opened and out crawled a large termite.

"Intruder! Kill it!" Vulois TF'd to Robot Mode.

"No, please don't shoot. My name is Terminess. I lead a young band of 
Predacons on Cybertron. I have great mental skills, which some people 
call psycic powers. Without me, my bad will surly fall apart and die. 
I was accidentaly detected and sentenced to spend the rest of my life 
asleep in a stasis pod. I used my abilities to change the course and 
bring me here. I just want to go home. I am great at things like 
this; I could help build the ship. I have a bod just a few parsec's 
from here which we could use. All I ask is that I come with you.

"Very well. I'll talk to Hell Beast about setting you up a small lab. 
I'll get you some quarters. You can bunk here for the night."

"Thank you so much! You will not regret this."
